name: Sheebah Karungi
bio: Bold Ugandan artist known for empowering lyrics and dancehall energy.

name: David Lutalo
bio: Singer-songwriter rooted in Luganda storytelling and kadongo kamu traditions.

name: Vinka (Veronica Lugya)
bio: Pop and dancehall artist blending Afrobeat with urban pop and streetwise lyrics.

name: Peace Eve (Ava Peace)
bio: Rising singer combining Afro-pop, dancehall, and gospel influences with community-focused storytelling.

name: Spice Diana
bio: A celebrated Ugandan artist known for melodic hooks and cultural influence.
